casebody.data:
A. GALLO AND COMPANY, INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
Daniel C. ESTY, Commissioner, Connecticut Department of Energy and Environmental Protection, et al. No. 13-625. Supreme Court of the United States March 24, 2014. Case below, 309 Conn. 810 , 73 A.3d 693 . Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Connecticut denied. Justice ALITO took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
